'''Reverend Fleming Rutledge''' is an American theologician. She has published various religious works, one of which is ''[[The Battle for Middle-earth (book)|The Battle for Middle-earth: Tolkien's Divine Design in The Lord of the Rings]]'' ([[2004]]).
